sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"惊吓，惊恐"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alarm, frighten, startle, terrify, scare, intimidate
means: alarm ：着重指某人意识到危险而突然产生的惊恐。
frighten ：普通用词，使用广泛，指产生突然、短暂的惊慌、恐怖感。
startle ：强调突然使人惊骇或震惊。
terrify ：语气最强，指惊骇得六神无主，魂飞魄散。
scare ：指非正式文体中可与frighten换用，但语气较重，侧重人受惊吓后立即停下正在干的事或跑掉。
intimidate ：指恐吓某人，迫使其做某事。

sentence.Network_en: Fairground rides are intended to frighten the life out of you.
sentence.Network_cn: 露天游乐场的飞车就是想把人吓丢了魂儿。

sentence.Network_en: I did not want to frighten or distress the horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我并不想吓到马或惹怒它。

sentence.Network_en: It doesn't frighten them. They're used to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可吓不倒他们。他们已经习惯了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版高一英语单词表_百度文库 ... damage 损失损害 frighten 使惊吓；吓唬 frightened 受惊的.受吓唬的.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... fright n. 惊恐；恐吓 frighten vt. 使惊恐，吓唬 frog n. 青蛙.
英语词汇归类联想巧记大全_免费素材_当知网 ... en, 表示"使......"， frighten  vt. 使恐惧，使害怕 ing 表示"令人......的"，.
惊讶_百度百科 ... 5、惊喜若狂【 Out of one's skin】 6、惊吓（frighten）【 Frighten】 7、惊险【 Alarmingly dangerous】.

list.abs: Mother ' s calm behavior made the frightened child quiet ., 母亲沉着的态度使那受惊的孩子安静.
字典中虞字的解释 ... (8) 贻误;欺诈[ bungle;cheat] (9) 惊[ start;be frightened] (10) 通“娱”[ give pleasure to;amuse].
carry - 英汉词典 ... carry ... to the extreme 走向极端 frighten away 吓跑, 吓走 get around 走动; 旅行.
典范英语5B——9_梦莱翔_新浪博客 ... 4.closed on her foot 夹住了她的脚 5.frighten away 吓走 6.get it off 挣脱开.
墨魂_互动百科 ... 墨汁【 prepared Chinese ink】 魂不守舍【 extremely frightened】 魂飞魄散【 frightened out of one's wits】.

entry.def: If something or someone frightens you, they cause you to suddenly feel afraid, anxious, or nervous.

example.ex: He knew that Soli was trying to frighten him, so he smiled to hide his fear...
example.tran: 他知道索利是想吓唬他，所以他挤出笑容掩饰自己的恐惧。

example.ex: Most children are frightened by the sight of blood.
example.tran: 大多数孩子见到血就害怕。

entry.tran: 使吓得魂飞魄散;使吓破了胆
entry.def: If something frightens the life out of you, frightens the wits out of you, or frightens you out of your wits, it causes you to feel suddenly afraid or gives you a very unpleasant shock.

example.ex: Fairground rides are intended to frighten the life out of you.
example.tran: 露天游乐场的飞车就是想把人吓丢了魂儿。

entry.def: If you frighten away a person or animal or frighten them off, you make them afraid so that they run away or stay some distance away from you.

example.ex: The fishermen said the company's seismic survey was frightening away fish...
example.tran: 渔民们说这家公司进行的地震勘测把鱼都吓跑了。

example.ex: He fired into the air, hoping that the noise would frighten them off.
example.tran: 他向空中开枪，希望枪声能把它们吓走。

entry.tran: 使吓得不敢打交道(或参与)
entry.def: To frighten someone away or frighten them off means to make them nervous so that they decide not to become involved with a particular person or activity.

example.ex: Building society repossessions have frightened buyers off...
example.tran: 建屋互助协会收回未偿清房贷的住房，这吓退了很多买家。

example.ex: The government is convinced that the bombers want to frighten away foreign investors.
example.tran: 政府确信炸弹袭击者的目的是想吓跑外国投资者。

entry.def: If you frighten someone into doing something they would not normally do, you make them do it by making them afraid not to do it.

example.ex: He was a bully. He tried to frighten people into doing what he wanted.
example.tran: 他恃强欺弱，总是想吓得人们按他的意愿做事。

sentences.sentence: "The stranger who hangs around the building frightens me"

auth_sentence.content: If I did, I should frighten the ghost.

auth_sentence.res_content: Did something frighten the Romans from filling the graves?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Did something frighten the Romans from filling the graves?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: The editor is frightened by this news, but he is more frightened by the idea of losing his newspaper, so he agrees to sign.
The editor is frightened by this news, but he is more frightened by the idea of losing his newspaper, so he agrees to sign.
A growing number of Americans are seeing the accumulation and distribution of computerized date as a frightening invasion of their privacy.
Frightened victims can rarely make correct identification.
Perhaps we are even a bit frightened we may get like that, so we laugh.

Among global warming's most frightening threats is the prediction is that the polar ice-caps will melt, raising sea level so much that coastal cities from New York to Los Angles to Shanghai will be flooded.

sentences.en: You'll find that I don't frighten easily.
sentences.cn: 你会发现我不是轻易就会害怕的。

sentences.en: It frightened me sometimes to see that.
sentences.cn: 看到那种事, 有时真令我害怕。

sentences.en: She was frightened to ride a bike.
I was frightened that he might cut himself.
Don't frighten me.He is telling the truth.
sentences.cn: 不要吓我, 他说的是真的。

jushi.english: You'll find that I don't frighten easily.

It frightened me sometimes to see that.
